name: Clempire
description:
Nicer when played in full screen :)

Clempire (clicking + empire) is an idle game with three resources: stone, wood, and gold. Click on the Big tree to gather wood and mine stone or gold by clicking on the large stone image. By gathering resources and fulfilling other requirements you can unlock achievements and new buildings. These will show up in the middle of the top bar and can by bought by clicking them. The game automatically saves it's current state in cookies every few minutes.

You can turn off the sound/music via the two buttons on the top right.

Clempire can also be played on clempire.nikl.me (the save will be a different one though).

Credits for used assets and the source code can be found on GitHub.
